name: "Sleep Tight" Vintage Poster
description:
This super cute series date back to the 1960s and are restored copies of original school posters illustrating good health practices!

The series of 3 would look great hanging in your child's bedroom, or there is the option to just purchase one or two prints. Buy all three and save! We particularly like the 'Wash Your Hands' for the bathroom. 

Sized to fit perfectly into the IKEA Ribba 30 x 40cm frame. Or they can also fit the bigger Ribba 40 x 50cm frame using the matte board supplied with the frame. 

Print Size 30cm x 40cm.

Mailed to you in a rigid cardboard envelope for total protection to arrive in your hands in pristine condition. Please note, the frame is not included. 

Postage within Australia $7

name: K2 Scarf - SOOV RED
description:
The limited edition K2 Scarf is designed and handmade by Kyrie Kohlhagen.

Kyrie mixes a range of vintage and new fabrics together to create a unique reversible scarf design. Each scarf features two complimentary fabrics giving you two completely different looks. Now that's clever.

This scarf is more like a neck tie, an accessory rather than worn for warmth - inspired by the swanky style of the 1950s. Can also be worn as a head scarf...Fancy that! 

100% Cotton and will soften with age - Kind of like a pair of your favorite jeans! 

This gorgeous range of K2 Scarves are made using locally designed fabrics from Surface Art Textile Design. Delivered to you in a square gift box, with a cute "how to tie" instruction leaflet tucked inside.

SOOV RED - Red/Spice/Natural with Red backing

Free Postage!

name: Bofinger-Stuhl
description:
Celebrating the coolest chair designers!

If you can't afford a real Bofinger-Stuhl designed by Helmut Batzner, there's no need to worry. Now you can have your very own designer chair that fits in the palm of your hand!

We feel this is the perfect solution to add a design element and splash of colour to any room.

These highly collectible 1/12 scale chairs are inspired by some of the greatest chairs ever created and look awesome displayed alone or in a collection on a bookshelf, window-sill or coffee table.

Please note that these chairs are a collectors item and are not designed as a children's toy. (Made of Plastic)

A great gift idea, each chair is delivered to you lovingly packaged in our special gift box.

Postage within Australia $5
